dsDescriptionValue.value: 2011 Census Statistics by Edmonton neighbourhood from "Abbotsfield" to "York".

value: The City of Edmonton Neighbourhood Boundaries GIS (.shp) and Google Earth (.kml) files can be found on the City of Edmonton Open Data Catalogue

files.description: This table includes characteristics of people in Edmonton neighborhoods such as population, age, sex, dwellings, families, marital status and language.
